name: 6 Great Games: Windows XP Edition
summary:
Compilation of 6 games consisting of:

- Creatures 3
- Microsoft Golf 1998 Edition
- Missile Command
- New Vegas Games
- Platinum Pinball
- Tomb Raider III: Adventures of Lara Croft

name: 6 Games
summary: An obscure compilation consisiting of six games for the ZX81.
